header.subtitle.message: Our solutions make familiarization possible for both own and hired equipment, and provide a collected overview of documented and certified competence.

general.readmore.description: The label used to link to the full article

general.contactus.title.message: Vil du vite mer? Kontakt oss
general.contactus.title.description: The label used to link to the contact page

home.banner.title1.description: The title of the home page

home.banner.title2.description: The title of the home page part two

home.safety.title.description: The title of the safety section on the home page

home.safety.what.message: Vår programvare gjør det enkelt å tilrettelegge for effektive og trygge arbeidsplasser. Dette gjør vi ved å samle mennesker og maskiner i en plattform.
home.safety.what.description: The description of the safety section on the home page

home.safety.how.message: I DigiQuip kan bedrifter gjennomføre opplæring, kontrollere arbeidsutstyr og finne viktige dokumenter og informasjon.
home.safety.how.description: The how part of the description of the safety section on the home page

home.safeuse.title.message: Sikker bruk av arbeidsutstyr krever nødvendig opplæring og kompetanse
home.safeuse.title.description: The title of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.safeuse.arg1.message: DigiQuip forenkler håndteringen av kompetanse, opplæring og dokumentasjon. Vi har en unik løsning for gjennomføring og administrasjon av utstyrsspesifikk opplæring. I tillegg gir løsningen oversikt over kurs, kompetansebevis, prosjekterfaring og utdanning.
home.safeuse.arg1.description: The first argument of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.safeuse.arg2.message: Når brukerne skanner QR-koden på maskinen, ser de umiddelbart hvilken kompetanse de trenger, status og om maskinen kan tas i bruk.
home.safeuse.arg2.description: The second argument of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.safeuse.arg3.message: By placing QR codes on machines or equipment, users gain immediate access to their own competency status for the specific work equipment.
home.safeuse.arg3.description: The third argument of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.consolidate.title.message: Samle alt arbeidsutstyr og dokumentasjon i en plattform
home.consolidate.title.description: The title of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.arg1.message: I DigiQuip har bedrifter kontroll på viktig informasjon, alt fra brukermanualer, CE-dokumenter, kompetansekrav til kontrollstatus.
home.consolidate.arg1.description: The first argument of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.arg2.message: Denne informasjonen er lett tilgjengelig for brukerne fra maskinens QR-kode.
home.consolidate.arg2.description: The second argument of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.point1.description: The first point of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.point2.message: Hold oversikt over både daglige og årlige kontroller.
home.consolidate.point2.description: The second point of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.point3.description: The third point of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.share.title.message: Fra modellregisteret deler leverandører effektivt og kostnadsfritt informasjon og innhold
home.share.title.description: The title of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.share.arg1.message: I modellregisteret registrerer og oppdaterer leverandører produktinformasjon, dokumenter, kompetansekrav og opplæring. Innholdet lagres et sted, og deles med mange.
home.share.arg1.description: The first argument of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.share.arg2.message: With information and content in one place, everyone has access to updated information on various models at all times.
home.share.arg2.description: The second argument of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.share.arg3.message: Our model library is free and open to all. This is how we facilitate better, simpler, and faster information sharing for everyone working with machinery and equipment.
home.share.arg3.description: The third argument of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.share.point1.description: The first point of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.share.point2.description: The second point of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.share.point3.description: The third point of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.expert.title.message: Effektiv gjennomføring og dokumentasjon av sakkyndig kontroll
home.expert.title.description: The title of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.arg1.message: Med vår løsning planlegger og gjennomfører inspektører sakkyndig kontroll. Maskineier får også full oversikt over status, kontrollfrister og nødvendig dokumentasjon.
home.expert.arg1.description: The first argument of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.arg2.message: Machine owners also gain complete visibility into the status, inspection deadlines, and necessary documentation.
home.expert.arg2.description: The second argument of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.point1.description: The first point of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.point2.message: Spar tid ved hjelp av fleksible sjekklister.
home.expert.point2.description: The second point of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.point3.message: Gjennomfør og dokumenter enkelt hver årskontroll.
home.expert.point3.description: The third point of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.ourpartners.title.description: The title of the our partners section on the home page

home.contact.title.message: Ønsker du tilgang til maskininformasjon, opplæring og bedre oversikt over kompetanse?
home.contact.title.description: The title of the contact section on the home page

home.contact.button.description: The button label of the contact section on the home page

competence.banner.title1.description: The title of the competence page part one

competence.banner.title2.description: The title of the competence page part two

competence.banner.title3.message: Kompetanse er en viktig faktor for både fremdrift og sikkerhet.
competence.banner.title3.description: The title of the banner(image) competence page part three

competence.banner.arg1.message: Feil bruk av arbeidsutstyr øker risikoen på arbeidsplassen. Derfor er det viktig at arbeidsgivere har oversikt og gir nødvendig opplæring når det trengs.
competence.banner.arg1.description: The first argument of the competence progress and safety section on the competence page

competence.banner.arg2.message: Vi har gjort det enkelt å gjennomføre utstyrsspesifikk opplæring. I tillegg er det enkelt å holde oversikt over en rekke typer kompetanse, alt fra utdanning til erfaring.
competence.banner.arg2.description: The second argument of the competence progress and safety section on the competence page

competence.practical_training.title1.description: The title of the practical training section on the competence page

competence.practical_training.title2.description: The second title of the practical training section on the competence page

competence.practical_training.arg1.message: I DigiQuip holder bedrifter oversikt over kompetansebevis, kurs, utstyrsspesifikk opplæring, fagbrev og prosjekterfaring på et sted. I kombinasjon med gode maskinoversikter, er løsningen spesielt godt egnet for alle som jobber med arbeidsutstyr.
competence.practical_training.arg1.description: The first argument of the practical training section on the competence page

competence.practical_training.arg2.message: Med oversikt over mennesker, kompetansekrav og arbeidsutstyr i en plattform, blir det enklere å holde oversikt og gjøre grep når det trengs.
competence.practical_training.arg2.description: The second argument of the practical training section on the competence page

competence.practical_training.img_descri.description: The description of practical training image in practical training section on the competence page

competence.digital_training.title.message: Vi har gjort det enkelt å gjennomføre utstyrsspesifikk opplæring
competence.digital_training.title.description: The first title of the digital training section on the competence page

competence.digital_training.arg1.message: I følge norske lover og regler skal arbeidsgiver alltid sørge for nødvendig opplæring. Det betyr at det skal gis opplæring i bruk av et bestemt arbeidsutstyr før bruk, og dette skal dokumenteres.
competence.digital_training.arg1.description: The first argument of the digital training section on the competence page

competence.digital_training.arg2.message: DigiQuip er den eneste løsningen hvor bedrifter fullt ut kan løse utstyrsspesifikk opplæring. Bedrifter styrer selv når opplæring er påkrevd, og ansatte gjennomfører opplæringen praktisk eller digitalt. Samtidig som opplæringen skjer, blir den automatisk dokumentert og lagret, og følger den ansatte uavhengig arbeidsgiver.
competence.digital_training.arg2.description: The second argument of the digital training section on the competence page

competence.digital_training.img_descript.description: The description of digital training image in digital training section on the competence page

competence.grouphelp.title1.description: The first title of the grouphelp section on the competence page

competence.grouphelp.title2.description: The second title of the grouphelp section on the competence page

competence.grouphelp.title3.description: The third title of the grouphelp section on the competence page

competence.grouphelp.title4.description: The fourth title of the grouphelp section on the competence page

competence.grouphelp.arg.message: Oversikt på tvers av avdelinger og bedrifter trenger ikke være en krevende øvelse. Hvis du trenger å sjekke enkeltpersoners kompetanse for en rekke maskiner, har vår løsning verktøyene du trenger.
competence.grouphelp.arg.description: The argument of the grouphelp section on the competence page

competence.grouphelp.arg2.message: Vi vet at det kan være krevende å identifisere hvem som trenger, og ikke trenger, opplæring, og derfor har vi rapporter som gjør denne jobben enklere.
competence.grouphelp.arg2.description: The second argument of the grouphelp section on the competence page

competence.grouphelp.img_description.description: The description of grouphelp image in grouphelp section on the competence page

workequipment.banner.title1.description: The first title of the work equipment page

workequipment.banner.title2.description: The second title of the work equipment page

workequipment.banner.title3.description: The third title of the work equipment page

workequipment.banner.title4.message: Effektiviser interne prosesser ved å samle alt arbeidsutstyr et sted.
workequipment.banner.title4.description: The fourth title of the work equipment page

workequipment.banner.arg1.message: CE-dokumenter, brukermanualer og kontrollrapporter er ofte spredt over ulike systemer, og dette blir i praksis tidkrevende.
workequipment.banner.arg1.description: The first argument of the work equipment banner

workequipment.banner.arg2.message: For en bedrift som håndterer maskiner og utstyr, er det viktig for effektiviteten at disse dokumentene er lett tilgjengelige. Dette sikrer at tid kan brukes på å få ting gjort, heller enn på administrativt arbeid.
workequipment.banner.arg2.description: The second argument of the work equipment banner

workequipment.systematized_documentation.description: The title of the systematized documentation section in the work equipment page

workequipment.systematized_documentation.message: Bedrifter som har maskiner og utstyr i DigiQuip oppnår bedre oversikt og kontroll. Når bedrifter samler alle dokumenter og informasjon et sted, spares tid og penger.
workequipment.systematized_documentation.description: The first argument of the systematized documentation section in the work equipment page

workequipment.systematized_documentation.message: Og ikke minst, slipper de ansatte å gjøre samme jobben flere ganger.
workequipment.systematized_documentation.description: The second argument of the systematized documentation section in the work equipment page
The first point of the systematized documentation section on the work equipment page
The second point of the systematized documentation section on the work equipment page
The third point of the systematized documentation section on the work equipment page

workequipment.machines_equipment.title1.description: The first title of the machine equipment section in the work equipment page

workequipment.machines_equipment.title2.description: The second title of the machine equipment section in the work equipment page

workequipment.machines_equipment.arg1.message: Få enkel oversikt over siste kontrollstatus og kommende årskontroller. Sakkyndig kontrollinformasjon føres enten inn manuelt eller kan hentes inn fra andre systemer.
workequipment.machines_equipment.arg1.description: The first argument of the machine equipment section in the work equipment page

workequipment.machines_equipment.arg2.message: Hvis maskin eller utstyr krever daglig kontroll, vil en bruker som skanner maskinens QR-kode få en påminnelse om dette. Denne daglige kontrollen blir samtidig loggført.
workequipment.machines_equipment.arg2.description: The second argument of the machine equipment section in the work equipment page

workequipment.machines_equipment.point1.description: The first point of the machine equipment section on the work equipment page

workequipment.machines_equipment.point2.description: The second point of the machine equipment section on the work equipment page

workequipment.machines_equipment.point3.description: The third point of the machine equipment section on the work equipment page

workequipment.specific_competence.title1.description: The first title of the specific competence section in the work equipment page

workequipment.specific_competence.title2.description: The second title of the specific competence section in the work equipment page

workequipment.specific_competence.arg1.message: Velg mellom egne digitale opplæringer eller bruk leverandørens.
workequipment.specific_competence.arg1.description: The first argument of the specific competence section in the work equipment page

workequipment.specific_competence.arg2.message: I DigiQuip kan du lage egne opplæringer. Opplæringen inneholder støtte for videoer og obligatorisk quiz.

workequipment.specific_competence.img_de.message: Få oversikt over din utstyrsspesifikk kompetanse.
workequipment.specific_competence.img_de.description: The description of specific competence image in specific competence section on the work equipment page

modellibrary.banner.title1.description: The first title of the model library banner section on the model library page

modellibrary.banner.title2.description: The second title of the model library banner section on the model library page

modellibrary.banner.title3.message: I modellregisteret oppretter og deler leverandører informasjon og innhold.
modellibrary.banner.title3.description: The third title of the model library banner section on the model library page

modellibrary.banner.arg1.message: Informasjonen opprettes, deles og oppdateres et sted. Dette er tids- og kostnadsbesparende for alle: Leverandør, kunde og brukere.
modellibrary.banner.arg1.description: The first argument of the model library banner section in the model library page

modellibrary.banner.arg2.message: Modellregisteret er kostnadsfritt fordi vi ønsker å bidra til sikrere arbeidsplasser. Vi mener at jo mer informasjon som deles, desto bedre er utgangspunktet for at maskiner og utstyr blir brukt riktig.
modellibrary.banner.arg2.description: The second argument of the model library banner section in the model library page

modellibrary.library.title.message: Samle informasjon og innhold et sted og del med mange
modellibrary.library.title.description: The title of the library section on the model library page

modellibrary.library.arg1.message: Hvorfor bruke 100 mapper til brukermanualer, videoer, dokumenter og spesifikasjoner når alt kan samles i et modellregister?
modellibrary.library.arg1.description: The first argument of the library section in the model library page

modellibrary.library.arg2.message: Med innhold tilgjengelig fra én løsning får alle alltid tilgang til siste oppdaterte informasjon når de trenger det.
modellibrary.library.arg2.description: The second argument of the library section in the model library page

modellibrary.library.point1.description: The first point of the library section on the model library page

modellibrary.library.point2.description: The second point of the library section on the model library page

modellibrary.library.point3.description: The third point of the library section on the model library page

modellibrary.easy_training.title.description: The title of the easy training section on the model library page

modellibrary.easy_training.arg1.message: Videoer er en enkel måte å lære brukere om utstyr og maskiner. For utleiebedrifter og leverandører minimerer opplæringsvideoer support og sikrer riktig bruk.
modellibrary.easy_training.arg1.description: The first argument of the easy training section on the model library page

modellibrary.easy_training.arg2.message: Å produsere gode videoer kan være ressurskrevende, både med tanke på fag og tid. Innholdet må planlegges, filmes, redigeres, og krever ofte flere runder med justeringer. Derfor kan vi bidra i denne prosessen..
modellibrary.easy_training.arg2.description: The second argument of the easy training section on the model library page

modellibrary.easy_training.arg3.message: Vi samarbeider tett med våre kunder - eksempelvis
modellibrary.easy_training.arg3.description: The third argument of the easy training section on the model library page

modellibrary.easy_training.arg4.message: for en uforpliktende prat om deres behov, så finner vi en god løsning.
modellibrary.easy_training.arg4.description: The fourth argument of the easy training section on the model library page

expertcontrol.banner.title1.description: The title of the expert control page

expertcontrol.banner.title2.message: BRAREG helps inspectors to perform annual controls using an easy checklist, accessible from our QR-code on the equipment.
expertcontrol.banner.title2.description: The title of the expert control page

expertcontrol.banner.arg1.message: BRAREG is a continuation from 123Service used by inspectors across Norway until now, performing more than 500 inspections per week. BRAREG provides better sharing features, better checklist features and is more easy to use.
expertcontrol.banner.arg1.description: The first argument of the expert control section in the expert control page

expertcontrol.banner.arg2.message: As an Inspector you may use the mobile device that suites your working style - a smart phone, pad or laptop - take photos of issues you discover - finalize and share the inspection report with others.
expertcontrol.banner.arg2.description: The first argument of the expert control section in the expert control page

expertcontrol.easyflow.title.description: The title of easy flow section in the expert control page

expertcontrol.easyflow.arg1.message: Whether an inspection is planned or ad-hoc, BRAREG gives you a easy-to-use inspection flow with pre-configured checklists that the technical manager can easily adapt.
expertcontrol.easyflow.arg1.description: The first argument of the easy flow section in the expert control page

expertcontrol.easyflow.arg2.message: Look up or scan the QR code on the equipment, start the inspection, work your way through the checklist point by point and document with pictures if necessary. Then finalize the report and share it with those who need it.
expertcontrol.easyflow.arg2.description: The second argument of the easy flow section in the expert control page

expertcontrol.easyflow.arg3.message: When you finalize the inspection, the equipment register is also updated with the new status.
expertcontrol.easyflow.arg3.description: The third argument of the easy flow section in the expert control page

expertcontrol.easyflow.point1.message: Easy-to-use flow; start, do, finalize, share.
expertcontrol.easyflow.point1.description: The first point of the easy flow section on the expert control page

expertcontrol.easyflow.point2.message: Easy to look up or scan QR-code to start inspection.
expertcontrol.easyflow.point2.description: The second point of the easy flow section on the expert control page

expertcontrol.easyflow.point3.message: Plan ahead or start the inspection ad-hoc.
expertcontrol.easyflow.point3.description: The third point of the easy flow section on the expert control page

expertcontrol.easyflow.img_description.message: Easy-to-use flow, good search and lookup..
expertcontrol.easyflow.img_description.description: The description of easy flow image in section on the competence page

expertcontrol.inspection.title.description: The title of inspection section in the expert control page

expertcontrol.inspection.arg.message: Inspection history can be made available across other companies and other systems. The register makes it easy to avoid duplicated equipment and ensure that all inspections follow the equipment regardless of owner and user.
expertcontrol.inspection.arg.description: The first argument of the inspection section in the expert control page

expertcontrol.inspection.point1.message: One equipment, one register entry enable a complete inspection history across business entities.
expertcontrol.inspection.point1.description: The first point of the inspection section on the expert control page

expertcontrol.inspection.point2.message: Equipment owner have access to inspection history on their own equipment.

expertcontrol.logs.title.message: Reports and audit logs make both day to day work and revision easier
expertcontrol.logs.title.description: The title of logs section in the expert control page

expertcontrol.logs.arg.message: In BRAREG it is easy to find answers to questions the auditor asks, such as how many inspections have been carried out within each category, which checklists have been used, how many inspections have been unlocked and why?
expertcontrol.logs.arg.description: The first argument of the logs section in the expert control page

expertcontrol.logs.point1.description: The first point of the logs section on the expert control page

expertcontrol.logs.point2.description: The second point of the logs section on the expert control page

expertcontrol.logs.point3.message: Audit log for all actions in BRAREG.

expertcontrol.logs.img_description.message: Reports of upcoming equipment inspections, done inspections and checklist usage.

aboutus.banner.title1.description: The title of banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.title2.message: Through years of building a rental business, Lars saw a clear need to improve safety for customers.
aboutus.banner.title2.description: The second title of banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.arg1.message: Incorrect use of equipment is potentially very risky and can lead to serious injuries, or, in worst case, even death. The lack of easily accessible and structured product information, as well as limited collaboration in the industry, held back improvement in safety.
aboutus.banner.arg1.description: The first argument of the banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.arg2.message: The need was clear – to offer the industry a solution that centralizes content for rental companies and businesses, in cooperation with dealers and OEMs, and make this information easily accessible to equipment users.
aboutus.banner.arg2.description: The second argument of the banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.arg3.description: The third argument of the banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.contact.title.message: DigiQuip helps you solve equipment training, machine inspections and in general to get the control you need
aboutus.contact.title.description: The title of contact section in the aboutus page
